paint

Interface PickListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener

    public interface PickListener
extends java.util.EventListener
    A listener to color picking events in a PaintCanvas. Whenever a color is picked using the color dropper tool, a PaintCanvas call the colorPicked() method in all listeners so that actions can been taken.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void colorPicked(javafx.scene.paint.Color c)
      Called when a color is picked.

    • Method Detail

      • colorPicked

        void colorPicked(javafx.scene.paint.Color c)
        Called when a color is picked. The color that has been picked is given as a parameter.
        Parameters:
        c - Color the picked color
